name: Sterling Silver or 14kt GF Arrowhead Hoop Earrings
description:
These hoops are made from .925 sterling silver, or 14kt gold filled - you choose the metal. They've been formed, hammered, and polished by hand, and are ready to add a little southwest style to your ears.

MEASUREMENTS:
The hoops measure about 1.25" from top to bottom.

*These earrings are made to order.

name: Large Gusseted Screen Printed Canvas Tote Bag
description:
This heavy canvas tote bag is gusseted at the bottom, allowing you more room to pack your bag full of essentials!  The larger size works great as an everyday bag for those that like something larger, but for the times when you need something a little larger than the basic non-gusseted tote (for the market, books, etc.), this one fits the bill.

It is made of 100% cotton canvas and is natural in color.  You choose the design and color.  If you'd prefer a different ink color than the one shown on a specific design, just let me know!  Color choices are: black, metallic gold, neon pink, neon lime green, neon orange.

MEASUREMENTS:
16" x 16" x 4" with 24" handles.

name: Brass Crescent Necklace
description:
This bold necklace is made from a brass crescent I sawed, smoothed, and finished with a brushed texture.  It is finished off with a 30" brass chain that has been woven through the crescent pendant.  Closes with a gold plated lobster claw clasp.

*Please be aware that this is a delicate chain.

name: Bonjour Y'all Screen Printed T-Shirt or Tank Top
description:
What better way to greet people than with a friendly "Bonjour Y'all!"

This design is printed in white or metallic gold ink on a tri-blend charcoal grey tank (the first 2 pictures), OR a slightly cropped boxy fit charcoal grey t-shirt (the last 2 pictures) because cropped, boxy tees are all the rage right now, are they not?

The t-shirt is made of 65% polyester, 35% viscose and feels like a super soft vintage cotton t-shirt.

MEASUREMENTS: 
*This shirt is cut wide and is meant to have a casual, loose fit. 
23" wide (pit to pit) 
20" long

The tank top is made of 50% polyester, 25% cotton, and 25% rayon so it's super soft and comfy.

MEASUREMENTS:
15" pit to pit
26" long

name: 14kt Gold Filled Diamond Shaped Hoops
description:
This modern pair of hoops is made from 14kt GF that I formed, sanded, and hammered. They're made in the shape of a diamond, and they're lightweight so you won't even know you're wearing them! These earrings are made to order, so please allow up to a week after placing the order for them to be shipped.

MEASUREMENTS:
The earrings measure about 1" long.

name: Bonjour Y'all Screen Printed Canvas Tote
description: This tote was born thanks to my Pop - one of the funniest people I've ever known. Among his many sayings, "Bonjour Y'all" is the greeting he says they use in the south of France. This 6 oz. cotton canvas tote is printed in your choice of metallic gold (as shown in the pictures), black, neon pink, neon orange, or neon green ink. MEASUREMENTS: 14" x 16" *Looking for this print on a 100% cotton flour sak towel for your kitchen? FIND IT HERE!

name: Thunderbird and Stone Bracelet
description:
These bracelets are vintage stock, and were so blackened and dirty from age that you couldn't tell what they were!  I gave them a much needed cleaning, a good buffing, and set stones in the eyes so they're ready to wear!

Copper thunderbird has an amazonite stone eye.
Brass thunderbird has a pyrite stone eye.
Antiqued thunderbird has a black tourmaline stone eye.

MEASUREMENTS:
These bracelets measure 6.5" long with a 1.5" opening and fit an average size wrist.

name: I Love Your Guts Screen Printed Boxy T-Shirt
description: This t-shirt is slightly cropped with a boxy fit to make it loose and comfortable, and cool for summer! It is screen printed with black ink and features a heart around the words "I LOVE YOUR GUTS" This shirt is made of 65% polyester, 35% viscose and feels like a super soft vintage cotton t-shirt. MEASUREMENTS: *This shirt is cut wide and is meant to have a casual, loose fit. 23" wide (pit to pit) 20" long *Looking for this print on a 100% cotton flour sack towel for your kitchen? FIND IT HERE!

name: Hammered Brass Tassel Cuff Bracelet
description:
This simple cuff bracelet is sure to add a little flair to your wrist; wear it plain or invite it to your arm party!

It's hand forged from brass and is finished with little vintage brass chain tassels.  Each bracelet is made to order, so please allow about 1 week, and choose the size that will best fit.

MEASUREMENTS:
The chain tassels measure about 1.25" long.

name: Pyrite and Brass Cuff Bracelet
description:
This cuff bracelet is made from a setting I filled with Pyrite )mined locally here in Virginia) and riveted to a textured brass cuff bracelet.

Measurements:
The cuff measures 6" with a small opening at the bottom for easy on and off.

name: Brass arrow cuff bracelet
description:
This simple, modern cuff bracelet is made from brass that I've sawed, shaped, and hammered for texture.  The cuff is left open, with both ends of an arrow forming the ends of the cuff.

MEASUREMENTS:
This cuff measures 6" around with a 1" opening, and best fits a 6" - 6.5" wrist.

name: Wild At Heart Screen Printed Cropped Tank Top
description:
This boxy, loose fit tank is cropped for the perfect, comfortable summer look! It's been screen printed with black ink and read, "WILD AT HEART".

The tank is made of 65% polyester, 35% viscose and feels like a super soft vintage cotton t-shirt.

MEASUREMENTS: 
19.75" wide (pit to pit) 
20" long shoulder to hem

name: Hammered 14kt Gold Filled Quartz Hoops
description:
this simple, modern pair of hoop earrings is made from 14kt/20 GF (gold filled) that i've forged, sanded and hammered. they're nice and lightweight so you won't even feel you're wearing them! *these earrings are made to order, so please allow one week for them to be made before they are shipped.

MEASUREMENTS:
the earrings measure appx. 1.5" long from top to bottom.

name: I'm Awesome Screen Printed Canvas Tote
description:
It's a pretty universally known fact that you're awesome, but just in case there are a few people that haven't yet heard, this should help clarify in English, French, German, and Spanish.

This 6 oz. cotton canvas tote is printed in your choice of metallic gold, black, neon pink (as shown in pictures), neon orange, or neon green ink.

MEASUREMENTS: 
14" x 16"

name: Brass Shield Necklace
description:
This bold necklace is made from a brass shield I sawed, smoothed and finished with a brass texture.  The pendant is attached to a vintage brass snake chain, which is suspended from a vintage brass serpentine chain.

The necklace measures approximately 30" long.

name: I Love Your Guts Screen Printed Canvas Tote
description: The opposite of "I hate your guts." This 6 oz. cotton canvas tote is printed in your choice of metallic gold, black (as shown in the pictures), neon pink, neon orange, or neon green ink. MEASUREMENTS: 14" x 16" *Looking for this print on a 100% cotton flour sack towel for your kitchen? FIND IT HERE!

name: 14kt Gold Filled & Brass Fortune Cookie Hoop Earrings
description:
These simple hoop earrings are made from 14kt GF and accented with vintage textured brass shapes that remind me of fortune cookies.  They're lightweight and comfortable to wear!

MEASUREMENTS:
The earrings measure just shy of 2" from the top of the hoop to the bottom of the brass "fortune cookie."

name: Arrowhead Bracelet
description:
This modern, slightly southwestern style bracelet is made from an aluminum arrowhead I sawed, sanded and polished, then attached to a hammered brass bracelet.  The bracelet can be put on and taken off by simply popping the one side of the arrowhead up off of the hooked end of the brass bracelet.

MEASUREMENTS:
The bracelet's circumference is 7.5" and the diameter is 2 3/8".

name: oxidized brass pyrite stud earrings
description:
this pretty pair of earrings is made with little pyrite chunks that i've set into antiqued brass bezels. they are for pierced ears and stay in place with little rubber ear nuts.  *because these earrings are made with natural pyrite, each pair will vary slightly!

MEASUREMENTS:
the earrings measure 10mm in diameter.

name: Aluminum and Brass Heart Bracelet
description:
This sweet little bracelet is made from an aluminum heart I sawed, sanded, and textured, that is attached to a hammered brass bracelet.

MEASUREMENTS:
This bracelet is 8" around and fits an average size wrist.  If you need it larger or smaller, just let me know!

name: Pyrite Heart Stud Earrings
description:
This pretty pair of earrings is made with pyrite (mined locally here in Virginia) that I've set in gold plated heart studs. The tiny little earrings have a rubber back.

MEASUREMENTS:
the earrings measure about 8mm diameter.

name: Flowershot Screen Printed Cropped Tank Top
description: This boxy, loose fit tank is cropped for the perfect, comfortable summer look! It's been screen printed with gold ink and features an old revolver shooting out a wildflower bouquet. The tank is made of 65% polyester, 35% viscose and feels like a super soft vintage cotton t-shirt. MEASUREMENTS: 19.75" wide (pit to pit) 20" long shoulder to hem *Looking for this print on a 100% cotton flour sack towel for your kitchen? FIND IT HERE! Or on a standard size pillowcase for your bedroom? FIND IT HERE!

name: Aluminum Arrow Cuff Bracelet
description:
This simple, modern cuff bracelet is made from 18ga aluminum that I've sawed, shaped, sanded and textured.  The cuff is left open, with both ends of an arrow forming the ends of the cuff.  It has a brushed texture.

MEASUREMENTS:
This cuff measures 6" around with a 1" opening, and best fits a 5.5" - 6.5" wrist.

name: 14kt Gold Filled Hoop Earrings With Vintage Chain Tassels
description:
This pretty pair of earrings is made from 14kt GF and decorated with little tassels made from a collection of vintage brass chains.  They're lightweight and comfortable to wear.

MEASUREMENTS:
The earrings measure 3" long from the top of the hoop to the bottom of the chain tassels.

name: Thunderbird Bracelet
description:
This modern, slightly southwestern style bracelet is made from an aluminum thunderbird I sawed, sanded and polished, then attached to a hammered brass bracelet.  The bracelet can be put on and taken off by simply popping the one side of the thunderbird up off of the hooked end of the brass bracelet.

MEASUREMENTS:
The bracelet's circumference is 7" and the diameter is 2 1/8".

name: Wild At Heart Screen Printed Canvas Tote
description:
For those that can't be tamed...

This 6 oz. cotton canvas tote is printed in your choice of metallic gold, black (as shown in pictures), neon pink, neon orange, or neon green ink.

MEASUREMENTS: 
14" x 16"

name: Arrow Fletching Bracelet
description:
This modern bracelet is made from an aluminum arrow fletching I sawed, sanded, and polished, then attached to a hammered brass bracelet.  The bracelet can be put on and taken off by simply popping the arrow fletching off of the hooked end of the bracelet.

MEASUREMENTS:
The bracelet's circumference is 8" and the diameter is 2.5".

name: Brass and Chrysocolla Cuff Bracelet
description:
This cuff bracelet is made from a setting I filled with Chrysocolla and riveted to a textured brass cuff bracelet.

Measurements: 
The cuff measures 6" with a small opening at the bottom for easy on and off.

name: Aqua Shell Jellyfish Earrings
description:
These jellyfish-inspired earrings are made from stacks of aqua color shells and a collection of vintage chains.  They're lightweight to wear.

MEASUREMENTS:
The earrings are 3.5"-4" long from the top of the hook to the bottom of the longest chain.

name: Smoky Quartz and Chains Earrings
description:
These modern earrings are made from natural, faceted smoky quartz points that have been draped with a collection of vintage chains.

MEASUREMENTS:
The earrings are 3.5"-4" long from the top of the hook to the bottom of the longest chain.

name: Spinning Pyrite Pendant Necklace
description:
This necklace is definitely one of my favorites! I've set chunks of pyrite into a pendant that has a spinning center, so pyrite is on both sides! The pendant hangs from a long, thin, vintage brass serpentine chain that closes with a spring ring clasp. VERY LIMITED QUANTITY!

MEASUREMENTS: 
The chain measures 30" long.

name: Aluminum and Brass Lightning Bolt Bracelet
description:
This bracelet is made from an aluminum lightning bolt that I sawed, sanded, and textured, that is attached to a hammered brass bracelet.

MEASUREMENTS:
This bracelet measures 8" around and fits an average size wrist, but if you need it larger or smaller, just let me know!

name: Wild At Heart Screen Printed Large Gusseted Canvas Tote
description:
For those that can't be tamed...

This 100% cotton canvas tote is printed in your choice of metallic gold, black (as shown in pictures), neon pink, neon orange, or neon green ink.  It's the perfect size for those that prefer a large everyday bag, or for the times you need something with extra room for the market, books, etc.

MEASUREMENTS: 
16" x 16" x 4" with 24" handles

name: Arrow Fletching Earrings
description:
This pretty, lightweight pair of earrings is made from heavy gauge aluminum that I've sawed, sanded and textured.  The aluminum fletchings dangle from handmade sterling silver ear wires.

MEASUREMENTS:
The aluminum fletchings measure a little over 1" long.

name: silver pyrite stud earrings
description:
this pretty pair of earrings is made from little natural pyrite nuggets that i've set into rhodium-plated (silver tone) bezels.  these are for pierced ears and stay in place with clear rubber ear nuts.  *because i use natural pyrite, each pair of earrings will vary slightly!

MEASUREMENTS:
the earrings measure appx. 8mm diameter.

name: hammered sterling silver quartz hoops
description:
this simple, modern pair of hoop earrings is made from sterling silver that i've forged, sanded and hammered. they're nice and lightweight so you won't even feel you're wearing them! *these earrings are made to order, so please allow several days for them to be made and shipped.

MEASUREMENTS:
the earrings measure about 1.5" long from top to bottom.

name: Quartz and Chains Earrings
description:
These modern earrings are made from natural, milky-clear quartz points that have been draped with a collection of vintage chains.

MEASUREMENTS:
The earrings are 3.5"-4" long from the top of the hook to the bottom of the longest chain.
